item.title: ACI/N9K â€“ How to convert a Nexus 9000 from NX-OS to ACI
item.description: Some time ago i posted how to convert a ACI switch to NX-OS, now the other way around. Copy the file to the NX-OS Mode N9k 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 switch# copy scp: bootflash: Enter source filename: Downloads/aci-n9000-dk9.12.2.1o.bin Enter vrf (If no input, current vrf 'default' is considered): management Enter hostname for the scp server: 192.168.0.5 Enter username: USER Password: aci-n9000-dk9.12.2.1o.bin 1% 15MB 3.8MB/s 04:34 ETA Change the boot mode to aci
